void calibrate ( char  pin  ) 

Sets up the base comparison for the Ultrasound results on BOB.

Parameters:
pin char - Which ADC pin should be used for the results
Returns:
void - Returns nothing
uint16_t ultrasound_filter ( char  pin  ) 

Filters the ultrasound data on BOB to make the data a little more smoother and remove oddball bits (aka outliers).

Parameters:
pin char - Which ADC pin should be used for the results
Returns:
uint16_t - The 10bit data from the ADC which has been filtered
